LanguageData.OralPleasure.label: (取乐)口腔
LanguageData.OralPleasure.actionDescription: {PREDATOR}正为寻求快感而将{PREY}纳入腹中
LanguageData.OralPleasure.description: 捕食者通过口腔将猎物存入胃袋以获取性快感。
LanguageData.FullTourPleasure.label: (取乐)体内巡游
LanguageData.FullTourPleasure.actionDescription: {PREDATOR}计划进行体内巡游同时为获取快感而将{PREY}纳入腹中
LanguageData.FullTourPleasure.description: 捕食者通过口腔将猎物存入胃袋以获取性快感，排出时将经由肠道。
LanguageData.AnalPleasure.label: (取乐)肛门
LanguageData.AnalPleasure.actionDescription: {PREDATOR}正为寻求快感而将{PREY}纳入臀部
LanguageData.AnalPleasure.description: 捕食者通过肛门将猎物存入肠道以获取性快感。
LanguageData.VaginalPleasure.label: (取乐)阴道
LanguageData.VaginalPleasure.actionDescription: {PREDATOR}正为寻求快感而将{PREY}纳入阴道
LanguageData.VaginalPleasure.description: 捕食者通过阴道将猎物存入子宫以获取性快感。
LanguageData.CockPleasure.label: (取乐)阴茎
LanguageData.CockPleasure.actionDescription: {PREDATOR}正为寻求快感而将{PREY}纳入阴茎
LanguageData.CockPleasure.description: 捕食者通过阴茎将猎物存入阴囊以获取性快感。
LanguageData.NipplePleasure.label: (取乐)乳首
LanguageData.NipplePleasure.actionDescription: {PREDATOR}正为寻求快感而将{PREY}纳入乳首
LanguageData.NipplePleasure.description: 捕食者通过乳首将猎物存入乳房以获取性快感。
